pkgmetadata.longdescription: tableformatter is a tabular data formatter allowing printing from both arbitrary tuples of strings or object inspection.It converts your data into a string form suitable for pretty-printing as a table. The goal is to make it quick and easyfor developers to display tabular data in an aesthetically pleasing fashion. It provides a simple public API, but allowsfine-grained control over almost every aspect of how the data is formatted.
